channel.title: Earbud static
channel.description: When ever I try to connect my earbuds to my computer, there's a static background on top of the sound that's extremely annoying. Does anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: Earbud static
item.dc:creator: Firebringer
item.description:
They were 20 bucks, but it’s like that will all earbuds connected to my computer.

Read full topic

item.title: Earbud static
item.dc:creator: Firebringer
item.description:
I just figured out that if I plug it into my speakers, than there’s a lot of static, the plug in the front of my computer there’s less but still some, and the wire isn’t long enough for me to use it comfortably, and I can’t test it out in the back because it’s not long enough.

Read full topic

item.title: Earbud static
item.dc:creator: mattemuse
item.description:
its because the earbud cable is unshielded and its picking up voltage from elements of your computer and/or other cables connected to your computer.

Make sure its nowhere near other cables, if this isn’t possible look into shielded cable. Maybe wrap it with tin foil?

Read full topic
